TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WebClass extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
[<System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")>]

summary.span: 使已升级的 Visual Basic 6.0 项目能够在 ASP.NET 中运行。

span.span: Enables upgraded Visual Basic 6.0 projects to run in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` 项目升级到 Visual Basic 时，会将其转换为 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 网站项目。When a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project is upgraded to Visual Basic, it is converted to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project. 声明将添加到你的项目中：一个用于，一个 `WebClass` 用于 `WebItem` `Template` 项目中的和 `WebClass` 。Declarations are added to your project: one for the `WebClass` and one for each `WebItem` and `Template` in the `WebClass` project. `Page_Load`事件过程将添加到项目。A `Page_Load` event procedure is added to the project. 这会创建一个 `WebClass` 对象，然后创建每个对象，并将 每个对象与 `WebItem` `Template` Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` 项目关联。This creates first a `WebClass` object and then objects for each `WebItem` and `Template` associated with the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project. 最后，在 `Page_Load` 事件过程中，您将看到对 `WebClass` 兼容性运行时的调用： 。Finally, in the `Page_Load` event procedure, you will see a call to the `WebClass` Compatibility runtime: . 这使运行时能够 在请求 URL 中呈现指定的。This enables the runtime to render the specified in the Request URL. 此代码是添加到已升级项目的唯一新代码，仅用于模拟 Visual Basic 6.0 运行时的基础行为 `WebClass` 。This code is the only new code added to your upgraded project and serves only to emulate the underlying behavior of the Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` runtime. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 升级工具使用类将 Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` 项目升级到网站 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 项目。The class is used by the upgrade tools to upgrade a Visual Basic 6.0 `WebClass` project to an [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Web-site project. [!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/includes/note-compatibility-md.md)]
